ModMetaData.name: [CZK] SeedsPlease Lite - Seeds Bench Restored
ModMetaData.description:
A small add-on for SeedsPlease: Lite restoring the seed processing bench to how it looked in the original SeedsPlease mod retexture. The benches functionality remains the same as the seed spot in SP:L, but it is reverted back to being an independent bench that can be placed anywhere.
Credits: - SeedsPlease: Lite created by Owlchemist - SeedsPlease (original) maintained by Charlotte - textures and artwork by me
ModMetaData.author: CitizenKanye
